mapper.update: update for_notes set theme = #{theme}, parent_modules = #{parentmodules}, childs_modules = #{childsmodules}, content = #{content}, status = #{status}, releasetime = #{releasetime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from for_notes where members_id = #{memberId} and status = 1
select * from for_notes n where 1=1 and members_id = #{0} and status = 1 limit #{1},#{2}
select count(*) from for_notes n where 1=1 and members_id = #{membersId} and status = 1
SELECT * FROM for_notes n WHERE 1=1 and n.members_id = #{0} limit #{1},#{2}
SELECT count(*) FROM for_notes n WHERE n.members_id = #{membersId}
select * from for_notes where 1=1 and childs_modules = #{0} and status = 1 limit #{1},#{2}
SELECT count(*) FROM for_notes n WHERE n.parent_modules = #{parentmodules} and status = 1
select * from for_notes where 1=1 and parent_modules = #{0} and status = 1 limit #{1},#{2}
select count(*) from for_notes where childs_modules = #{childsmodules} and status = 1

select count(*) from for_notes a where 1=1 and a.theme like CONCAT('%',#{theme},'%') and a.members_id like CONCAT('%',#{membersId},'%') and a.parent_modules like CONCAT('%',#{parentmodules},'%') and a.childs_modules like CONCAT('%',#{childsmodules},'%') and DATE_FORMAT(a.releasetime, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{beginCreateTime} and DATE_FORMAT(a.releasetime, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endCreateTime} order by a.id asc
select * from for_notes a where 1=1 and status = 1 order by a.id asc limit #{pn},#{ps}
select count(*) from for_notes where status = 1
